GameCard.description: Vertical poster style for game selection.

landing_hero.typography: Massive (text-7xl+) uppercase headings with 'stroke' text effect options.

dashboard_grid.density: High density, minimize whitespace in data panels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Barlow Condensed' (400,600,700) and 'Inter' and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.html.
2. THEME SETUP: Force dark mode by default. Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Obsidian' palette defined above.
3. BRACKET LOGIC: Build a recursive 'BracketRound' component. Use SVG for connecting lines (Bezier curves preferred over straight lines).
4. GAME CARDS: Use the 'GameCard' style for the Tournament creation selection and Game Listing.
5. DATA-TESTID: Every button, input, and interactive element MUST have a data-testid attribute.
6. PAYMENT: Mock the Stripe/PayPal buttons visually but ensure the flow (Registration -> Payment -> Confirmation) exists.
7. NO AUTH: Ensure the 'Register' flow asks for Name/Email only and stores it in localStorage or backend (if available) without password.
8. ANIMATIONS: Use <AnimatePresence> for route transitions and layoutId for smooth bracket updates.

rules: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic 2-column layouts. Overlap elements. Use negative margins.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding. Don't cram content.
Z-Index: Use layers. Background video -> Overlay gradient -> Content.
Micro-Interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95).
